author: randyk
msg: on Win32, printing strings of larger than about 10000 in size hangs
in the glue/perl/t/apreq/cgi test. For now print smaller messages,
and make a note in STATUS to come back to that.

author: randyk
msg: include modperl_perl_unembed.h within apreq_xs_postperl.h, so that
all xsbuilder/Apache/*/Apache_*.h files include it (needed on Win32
as Win32 Perl defines "link", which conflicts with the link member

author: randyk
msg: Upload content without the \r, as Win32 inserts an extra one at the end.

author: randyk
msg: on Win32 within cgi_log() of src/apreq_env.c, and make a note
